page.title: 17INDUSTRY IN PLAISTOW
page.content: The small businesses in Plaistow are the garage, the builders, and the Horologist. {Sherwood's Garage}has been there for 30 years. Before that it was a blacksmiths. Mr Sherwood employs two other local men. They repair cars but not motor bikes. The builder's yard is called {Wooldridge Yard.}It has been running for 55 years. The owner is Mr Wooldridge. He employs 12 men. It now costs Â£300 per 1000 bricks , but when Mr Wooldridge first took over bricks cost Â£12 per 1000. He has built 80 new houses and restored some old ones. Mr Hoad is an{Antiquarian {Horologist,Clockmaker and Automatist. His workshop is at Plaistow Place.
